#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
#include<cstdlib>
#include<algorithm>
#include<vector>
#include<cstring>
#include<cmath>
#include<stdbool.h>
#include<map>
#include<queue>
#include<stack>
#include<list>
#include<limits.h>
#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define LL long long int

int main()
{
	string S;
	string result="";
	int N,K;
	scanf("%d%d",&N,&K);
	cin>>S;
	int i,j;
	int ca,cb,cc;
	for(i=0;i<K;i++)
	{
		ca=0;cb=0;cc=0;
		for(j=i;j<N;j+=K)
		{
			if(S[j]=='a')
				++ca;
			else if(S[j]=='b')
				++cb;
			else
				++cc;
		}
		if(ca>=max(cb,cc))
			result+='a';
		else if(cb>=cc)
			result+='b';
		else
			result+='c';
	}
	cout<<result<<endl;
	return 0;
}
